entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 11:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
